org.pac4j.openid.client

Class BaseOpenIdClient<U extends CommonProfile>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OpenIdCredentials,U>
          • org.pac4j.openid.client.BaseOpenIdClient<U>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OpenIdCredentials,U>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    YahooOpenIdClient

    public abstract class BaseOpenIdClient<U extends CommonProfile>
extends IndirectClient<OpenIdCredentials,U>
    This class is a base implementation for an OpenID protocol client based on the openid4java library. It should work for all OpenID clients. In subclasses, some methods are to be implemented / customized for specific needs depending on the client.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Jerome Leleu
